page.title: 10MATERNITY HOSPITAL
page.content: {CHIPPENHAM MATERNITY HOSPITAL}HAS BEEN A HOSPITAL SINCE{1948}. BEFORE THAT IT WAS A PRIVATE HOME OWNED BY A VERY WEALTHY PERSON . THE HOSPITAL HAS A VERY{HOMELY ATMOSPHERE}. THERE ARE 13 BEDS WHICH TAKE UP 6 ROOMS . THEY HAVE 17 NURSES AND 27 LOCAL G.P.S MAKE USE OF THE{FACILITIES}AND SEND THEIR PATIENTS TO GREENWAYS . THERE ARE ALSO ATTENDING MIDWIVES . WOMEN OF 30 YEARS OF AGE ARE NOT ADMITTED TO GREENWAYS THEY ARE SENT TO GENERAL HOSPITALS AS ARE WOMEN WHO HAVE ANY COMPLICATIONS WITH THEIR PREGNANCY. GREENWAYS HAS NOW BEEN SOLD FOR{DEVELOPMENT.}IT IS PLANNED TO BUILD A NEW MATERNITY HOSPITAL IN{1986}IN ANOTHER PART OF CHIPPENHAM.
